duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop positive customer experience and act as a bridge between customers and delivery teams offshore and onsite.
Responsible for account growth and work with verticals for new opportunities.
Play the role of Data Architect for more than 10 years and for 2-3 enterprise-level applications.
Experience in ETL/ELT and DW architecture designing.

Perform business and requirement analysis, including data flow diagram, flowcharts, business process modeling, functional requirement analysis, source target mappings, gap analysis, cause and effect analysis, decision tree.
Hands-on experience and end-to-end knowledge on various Azure Cloud Services, including ADF, Synapse, Azure SQL, Azure Functions, etc.

Hands-on experience in Databricks, Python, Pyspark, and working with leading databases such as Snowflake, Oracle, SQL, T-SQL, My SQL. Additionally, experience in ETL Tools SSIS, SSRS, SSAS, Informatica, ADF, and visualization tools such as SSRS, Business Objects, Power BI.
